import React, {useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import '../styles/input.css' const Edit = ({post}) => { const {postId, title, content} = post const [titlePost, setTitlePost] = useState("") const [contentPost, setContentPost] = useState("") const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const body = { id: postId, title: titlePost, content: contentPost } } return (
setTitlePost(e.target.value) }/>
